main_tasks:
[What you will do]
 
백엔드 엔지니어링 프로세스 개선
API, 서비스 및 시스템 구축
주니어 엔지니어 멘토링
제품 설계 및 코드 관련 전략 계획

[English ver.]

Improve backend engineering processes
Build APIs, services, and systems
Junior engineers mentoring
Plan product design and code-related strategies
requirements:
[What we expect from you]
 
AWS, Docker, NoSQL, RDBMS, Caching System 경험이 있으신 분
Node.js, Express frameworks 활용한 백엔드 개발 경험이 있으신 분 
TDD 를 활용한 소프트웨어 개발 경험이 있으신 분

[English ver.]

Experience with AWS, Docker, NoSQL, RDBMS, Caching System
Experience with Backend development using Node.js, Express frameworks
Experience developing software using the TDD process
location: 서울시 강남구 역삼동 25길 23 대일테크 빌딩 (역삼역에서 도보 6분 이내)
jd:
3i is an invention-driven company headquartered in Seoul, Korea with deep-rooted technical experience in exploring difficult problem areas and innovating solutions that open doors to new perspectives and opportunities. At 3i, our mission is to build solutions that connect people and places. Our 3i’s are: Imagine, Invent and Inspire. We imagine different ways of leveraging technology to invent new solutions that inspire everyone to collaborate and share the world through their eyes. 

Beamo:  Beamo is a Visual Inspection & Collaboration solution for your mission critical assets. Beamo uses state-of-the art technology hardware and software to capture the entirety of your sites into an immersive 360 degree digital twin. With our spatial camera, Atlas Go, you can just start walking and capture 360° images. Atlas Go will automatically synchronize your location to all captured content so you don't have to do it yourself. Inspect your facilities 30% faster than traditional solutions (25,000 sqm. on average can be captured by one person in 8 hours) and generate a digital twin in a few minutes, not hours or days.

Pivo: 3i developed Pivo, a smart rotating pod that turns any smartphone into a self-capturing device. Pivo empowers everyone to move around freely while capturing their best moments continuously, and simplifies sharing precious moments globally.

We have team members with 20+ different nationalities, an innovative mindset management team leads the company. Various employee benefits packages will be offered who are contributing to the growth of the business. If you have a growth mindset and passion, welcome to ride the rocket!


Responsibilities
[What you will do]
 
백엔드 엔지니어링 프로세스 개선
API, 서비스 및 시스템 구축
주니어 엔지니어 멘토링
제품 설계 및 코드 관련 전략 계획

[English ver.]

Improve backend engineering processes
Build APIs, services, and systems
Junior engineers mentoring
Plan product design and code-related strategies

Basic Qualifications
[What we expect from you]
 
AWS, Docker, NoSQL, RDBMS, Caching System 경험이 있으신 분
Node.js, Express frameworks 활용한 백엔드 개발 경험이 있으신 분 
TDD 를 활용한 소프트웨어 개발 경험이 있으신 분

[English ver.]

Experience with AWS, Docker, NoSQL, RDBMS, Caching System
Experience with Backend development using Node.js, Express frameworks
Experience developing software using the TDD process

Preferred Qualifications
[Nice to have]

Java, C++ 경험이 있으신 분

[English ver.]

Experience with Java, C++

Company Benefits
[At 3i, we offer]

• 점심 식대 지원 
• 직급 및 포지션에 따라 스톡옵션 지급 가능
• 장기 근속자 포상
• 매달 우수사원 표창
• 매년 직원 건강검진 시행
• 편안한 자율 복장
• 초과 근무시 저녁식대 제공
• 임직원 생일선물 제공
• 조건 충족시 청년내일채움공제 신청 가능
• 3i Snack Bar: 다양하고 건강한 음료, 차, 커피 그리고 스낵 무한 제공
• 회사의 이익, 성장 기여도 및 개인 성과에 따른 정기 인센티브(연 1회) 및 수시 인센티브(연중 수시)
• 설, 추석 명절 상여 지급
• 회사제품 임직원 할인

[At 3i, we offer]
 
• Lunch allowances
• Employee stock options can be offered depending on the position
• Incentives given based on the company profit, growth, and individual performance
• Monthly MVP awards 
• Employee long service award
• Annual health check up program 
• Freedom with clothing
• Gifts provided on special days 
• Lunch allowances
• Overtime meal allowances
• Discounts on company products for employees
• 3i Snack Bar
